data.name: Scan sort.
data.description:
You have to write a software that drive some hardware.
The hardware is used to perform some measurement of some physical quantities in different configuration.
Between two configuration there is multiples parameters that can be changed.
But some parameters can take more time to be changed.
** And we only change one parameter at a time**

As an example, with a probe, we want to scan a two dimensional grid of 4 point.

    A B
    C D
    
But the probe move faster in vertical than in horizontal.
Hence a good scan sequence can be `A C D B` with only one horizontal movement.

An other exemple:

    A B C
    D E F
    G H I
    
With a fast horizontal movement and a slow vertical movement give:

    A B C F E D G H I


You are given an sequence of object and some parameter extractors.
The extractors are sorted from the slowest to the quickest parameters to change.
Your job is to sort the sequence to a have the fastest scan.

In our first exemple, the object are a Point class with some coordinates:

    class Point {
      ...
      public int X {get;}  // horizontal coordinate
      public int Y {get;}  // vertical coordinate
      ...
    }
    
And the parameter extractors are:

    new Func<Point, object>[] {
      p => p.Z, // Slow has hell
      p => p.Y  // Moving probe along Y is fast
    };
